content.text: Awning signs are a great way to increase brand visibility while providing functional shade and weather protection for your storefront. Royal Signs & Awnings creates custom awning solutions for Houston businesses.
An awning sign or canopy sign can give a lot of exposure to your business all day, every day. Everyone who passes by your storefront will see it and know about your business.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for your Free Consultation!

Being known by consumers might be one of the biggest challenges in managing a business. One strategy that's proven to work is to increase your brand visibility with commercial signage at your storefront.
Our awnings are made with high-quality, weather-resistant materials that withstand the Houston climate while maintaining their appearance.
Contact Royal Signs & Awnings for a free awning signs consultation. Call (281) 645-9935!
